_aChangeLog.text: collision of last lvl (you randomly got stuck on them before)
made boosters at end not rng
made the end and start snap to 64 so you can easily setup a timer
fixed some gay tree skip at start
fixed playerclip i messed up at end

_sText:
bhop_pharos

Map I've been working on of and on for the last 8 months, its about 4 mins long if no failed. The map has 3 stages with different styles. also a fly/surf bonus

Possible on scroll and 400vel cap. Fun to speedrun on auto too.

I ran into a shit ton of problems while trying to make the map optimized/work. hence some stages are kinda unoptimized, sorry for that.

Thanks to everyone who helped me make this.

Enjoy!

vmf available here: https://github.com/pietervanheijningen/bhop_maps
